Dialogue.Page: Stars above! Specifically that one! What is that?! And what are these structures?! This is the best day EVER!!

Okay, okay, actual notes, there’s so much to unpack here! For instance, THE NEW ALIEN CIVILIZATION!! What are they, or were they, and why were they here?! Their architecture is beautiful! Like those flashing towers at the poles, I have no idea what purpose they serve, but they’re in sync with that thing in the sky!
And the wormholes! I can’t believe a pair crashed in our solar system! I guess it was drifting through space? And this thing, whatever it-
I... <color=grey>pant...</color> That wall was a sensor activated door, I knew that! I’m fine!
Um, anyway, it’s open now! Inside is...<Pause> a giant hole.
Oh come on, how do I get down? I take stairs, not leaps of faith! Why can't it just have stairs?!
I guess the aliens flew? I can’t... no, I can. I have to go down, there’s no way I’m not exploring this. I have a jetpack, I can fly down- no, I will fly down! I’m jumping right NOW!!
